body_html:
While you're at it, I noticed that on the unsorted_segment_sum page, it refers to perhaps an older naming scheme:
"Unlike SegmentSum, segment_ids need not be sorted and need not cover all values in the full range of valid values."
body_text:
While you're at it, I noticed that on the unsorted_segment_sum page, it refers to perhaps an older naming scheme:
"Unlike SegmentSum, segment_ids need not be sorted and need not cover all values in the full range of valid values."
body:
While you're at it, I noticed that on the unsorted_segment_sum page, it refers to perhaps an older naming scheme:
   "Unlike **SegmentSum**, segment_ids need not be sorted and need not cover all values in the full range of valid values."
